events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically for a software developer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening of your technical skills and experience and are pleased with your background.
Thank you for your prompt reply to our initial screening feedback; we appreciate your enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You successfully completed the technical interview with the engineering panel, showcasing strong coding and problem-solving skills.
We have arranged your HR interview for April 25th in the afternoon to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview is complete. Our team was impressed by your teamwork and communication skills.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer to you for the Software Engineer position with competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement to join our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you onboard as part of our engineering division.
Your onboarding process has begun. You will receive access to tools and resources to get started smoothly.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration as a Software Engineer on our team.
